title: East Orange Oval
text: The East Orange Oval was an athletic field located at <a href="Brick%20Church%20%28NJT%20station%29">Brick Church</a> in <a href="East%20Orange%2C%20New%20Jersey">East Orange, New Jersey</a>. It was also the first known field used by the <a href="Orange%20Athletic%20Club">Orange Athletic Club</a> <a href="American%20football">football</a> team. The field was also used for <a href="track%20and%20field">track and field</a> events by the Old Brick Church of Orange, among other groups.
